sig_info: An excellent leader, Captain America learns from his teammates gaining a unique effect, while Kinetically Charged, for each class represented on his team, excluding himself.
Mutant: 40 to 100% chance on triggering a Special Attack to gain +1 Kinetic Potential.
Skill: 40 to 100% chance whenever a Debuff is gained, Consume 1 Kinetic Potential to Purify it.
Science: 40 to 100% chance on a Well-Timed Block to place a 10% Weakness Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds.
Mystic: 40 to 100% chance to gain 1 Kinetic Potential each time a Buff Expires or is Nullified on the Opponent.
Cosmic: 40 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place an Armor Break Debuff on the Opponent, reducing their Armor by 177.78 for 10 seconds.
Tech: 40 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place a 25% Petrify Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds.

KINETIC POTENTIAL - PASSIVE: Captain America’s vibranium vambraces can store up to 5 Kinetic Potential charges. He will not generate any new Kinetic Potential while at this limit.
15% Chance when Struck to gain 1 Kinetic Potential(s).
50% Chance when Blocking to gain +1 Kinetic Potential. This chance increases to 100% on a Well Timed Block.
100% Chance when Stunned to gain +1 Kinetic Potential.
Kinetic Potential falls off over time, falling off faster the longer its been since it last increased.
KINETICALLY CHARGED - PASSIVE: As long as Cap has at least 1 Kinetic Potential, he is considered to be Kinetically Charged, and gains the following bonuses as Passive effects:
+41.5 Attack
+533.33 Physical Resistance
+533.33 Energy Resistance
100% chance to Nullify all Unstoppable Buffs when striking the Opponent.
+30% chance to cause Opponent’s attacks to Glance. This chance increases by 100% against Mystic Champions.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Beginning to charge a Heavy Attack grants a Passive Fury granting +41.5 Attack per Kinetic Potential, lasting for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: After any special Attack, Cap consumes all Kinetic Potential.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 20.75 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds.
Reduces Opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy by 100% if Kinetically Charged.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to Stun for 1 second(s).
Each Kinetic Potential charge grants +41.5 Attack and +0.50 second(s) Stun Duration.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: If Kinetically Charged gain +83 Attack for each different Class on Cap’s team, not including himself, up to 2 Classes.
Gain 1 Non-Consumable Kinetic Potential charge which lasts 30 seconds.

Cosmic: 40 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place an Armor Break Debuff on the Opponent, reducing their Armor by 183.33 for 10 seconds.
Tech: 40 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place a 25% Petrify Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds.

KINETICALLY CHARGED - PASSIVE: As long as Cap has at least 1 Kinetic Potential, he is considered to be Kinetically Charged, and gains the following bonuses as Passive effects:
+54.5 Attack
+550 Physical Resistance
+550 Energy Resistance
100% chance to Nullify all Unstoppable Buffs when striking the Opponent.
+30% chance to cause Opponent’s attacks to Glance. This chance increases by 100% against Mystic Champions.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Beginning to charge a Heavy Attack grants a Passive Fury granting +54.5 Attack per Kinetic Potential, lasting for 5 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: After any special Attack, Cap consumes all Kinetic Potential.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 27.25 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds.
Reduces Opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy by 100% if Kinetically Charged.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to Stun for 1 second(s).
Each Kinetic Potential charge grants +54.5 Attack and +0.50 second(s) Stun Duration.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: If Kinetically Charged gain +109 Attack for each different Class on Cap’s team, not including himself, up to 2 Classes.
Gain 1 Non-Consumable Kinetic Potential charge which lasts 30 seconds.

SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 287 Direct Damage over 3.50 seconds.
Reduces Opponent’s Defensive Ability Accuracy by 100% if Kinetically Charged.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to Stun for 1 second(s).
Each Kinetic Potential charge grants +574 Attack and +0.50 second(s) Stun Duration.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: If Kinetically Charged gain +1148 Attack for each different Class on Cap’s team, not including himself, up to 2 Classes.
Gain 1 Non-Consumable Kinetic Potential charge which lasts 30 seconds.

sig_info: An excellent leader, Captain America learns from his teammates gaining a unique effect, while Kinetically Charged, for each class represented on his team, excluding himself.
Mutant: 40.1 to 100% chance on triggering a Special Attack to gain +1 Kinetic Potential.
Skill: 40.1 to 100% chance whenever a Debuff is gained, Consume 1 Kinetic Potential to Purify it.
Science: 40.1 to 100% chance on a Well-Timed Block to place a 10% Weakness Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds.
Mystic: 40.1 to 100% chance to gain 1 Kinetic Potential each time a Buff Expires or is Nullified on the Opponent.
Cosmic: 40.1 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place an Armor Break Debuff on the Opponent, reducing their Armor by 211.11 for 10 seconds.
Tech: 40.1 to 100% chance on a Well Timed Block to place a 25% Petrify Debuff on the Opponent for 10 seconds.

KINETIC POTENTIAL - PASSIVE: Captain America’s vibranium vambraces can store up to 5 Kinetic Potential charges. He will not generate any new Kinetic Potential while at this limit.
15% Chance when Struck to gain 1 Kinetic Potential(s).
50% Chance when Blocking to gain +1 Kinetic Potential. This chance increases to 100% on a Well Timed Block.
100% Chance when Stunned to gain +1 Kinetic Potential.
Kinetic Potential falls off over time, falling off faster the longer its been since it last increased.
KINETICALLY CHARGED - PASSIVE: As long as Cap has at least 1 Kinetic Potential, he is considered to be Kinetically Charged, and gains the following bonuses as Passive effects:
+342.5 Attack
+633.33 Physical Resistance
+633.33 Energy Resistance
100% chance to Nullify all Unstoppable Buffs when striking the Opponent.
+30% chance to cause Opponent’s attacks to Glance. This chance increases by 100% against Mystic Champions.
